home.intro: 96 MATERIALS CO., LTD. is committed to providing high-quality construction materials sourced from trusted manufacturers, ensuring strength and sustainability for every project.

about.title: About Us
content: The core of 96 MATERIALS CO., LTD. is an unwavering commitment to quality...
One of the company’s key strengths is its diverse and comprehensive product range...
96 MATERIALS emphasizes customer-centric service through a knowledgeable and responsive support team...
Sustainability is a priority, offering eco-friendly materials and embracing innovation in construction...

reviews.title: Projects / Reviews
reviews.description: Explore our projects and customer reviews to see the quality and reliability of our materials in action.

projects.description: A large-scale residential project using our heavy construction materials.

projects.name: Project B
projects.description: A commercial building project utilizing our steel and cement products.

projects.name: Project C
projects.description: A renovation project featuring our paints and decorative materials.
